it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.network.server

Class VirtualView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.utils.Observable<ClientEvent>
      • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.network.server.VirtualView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ServerEvent>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class VirtualView
extends Observable<ClientEvent>
implements Observer<ServerEvent>, java.lang.Runnable
    View of the client in the server side. Handle the communication with the client and the exchange of event.

    Each client has her virtual view.

    Run in a thread.

    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Manages the first phase of initialization of the client and then will remain in listening for the handle of the event by client
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • receiveEvents

        private void receiveEvents()
        Waits for event receiving by the client.

      • handleReconnection

        java.lang.String handleReconnection()
        Handles the reconnection of the client after his disconnection.
        Returns:
        The nickname of the client that is trying to reconnect or "Failed reconnection" if didnt' exists a client with that nickname at the beginning of the game.

      • updateStatusAfterReconnection

        void updateStatusAfterReconnection()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the following phase after the reconnection restoring the situation in the remote view sending all of the information stored during his absence.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there will be problems with writeObject with output object stream of client socket.

      • isNotValidNickname

        private boolean isNotValidNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        Checks if the nickname chosen by the client is valid or not. It's not valid if is equal to "termintor", "me" or is smaller than 2 character.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname to check is validation.
        Returns:
        True if the nickname is valid, false otherwise.

      • update

        Sends events received by Model and Controller to the client through socket stream only if its client is involved
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        event - The event received

      • updateListOfPlayerBoard

        void updateListOfPlayerBoard(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
        It is called by Server during the initialization of the game; It fills the list of player board that contains the information of all player board in order to allow the right reconnection
        Parameters:
        playerBoard - that has to be added to the list
